```{r, include=FALSE}

if (file.exists("./FAIRevaluation.csv")) {

my_csv2 <- read.csv2(file = "./FAIRevaluation.csv", header=FALSE)

data_collection <- my_csv2[1]

findable_q1_title <- 'Do you have a unique identifier for your datasets?'
findable_q2_title <- 'Do you have a unique identifier for the metadata?'
findable_q3_title <- 'Do you produce or collect metadata for all your data (e.g. handbook, guide for users, description, keywords, timestamp, spatial coverage etc.)? Please specify'
findable_q4_title <- 'Do you have a public metadata catalogue service?'


if (my_csv2[21] == 'q1a') {q1_a <- 'selected'}
if (my_csv2[21] == 'q1b') {q1_b <- 'selected'}
if (my_csv2[21] == 'q1c') {q1_c <- 'selected'}
if (my_csv2[21] == 'q1d') {q1_d <- 'selected'}


if (my_csv2[22] == 'q2a') {q2_a <- 'selected'}
if (my_csv2[22] == 'q2b') {q2_b <- 'selected'}


if (my_csv2[23] == 'q3a') {q3_a <- 'selected'}
if (my_csv2[23] == 'q3b') {q3_b <- 'selected'}
if (my_csv2[23] == 'q3c') {q3_c <- 'selected'}
if (my_csv2[23] == 'q3d') {q3_d <- 'selected'}


if (my_csv2[24] == 'q4a') {q4_a <- 'selected'}
if (my_csv2[24] == 'q4b') {q4_b <- 'selected'}
if (my_csv2[24] == 'q4c') {q4_c <- 'selected'}
if (my_csv2[24] == 'q4d') {q4_d <- 'selected'}

}

```

<script>

$('document').ready(initialise);
function initialise() {
$(document).on('change', 'select', function() {
update();
// if you want to do stuff based on the OPTION element:
//var opt = $(this).find('option:selected')[0];
});
update();
}


function update() {


var fscore = parseInt($('#q1').val()) + parseInt($("#q2").val()) + parseInt($('#q3').val()) + parseInt($('#q4').val());
$("#fbar").attr('style', "width: " +  (fscore / 17.0) * 100 + "%");
$("#fscore").html(parseInt((fscore / 17.0) * 100) + "%");
$("#fstars").html(createStars(fscore/17.0 * 5));

var ascore = parseInt($("#q5").val()) + parseInt($("#q6").val()) + parseInt($("#q7").val()) + parseInt($("#q14").val());
$("#abar").attr('style', "width: " +  (ascore / 10.0) * 100 + "%");
$("#ascore").html(parseInt((ascore / 10.0) * 100) + "%");
$("#astars").html(createStars(ascore/10.0 * 5));

var iscore = parseInt($("#q8").val()) + parseInt($("#q9").val()) + parseInt($("#q10").val());
$("#ibar").attr('style', "width: " +  (iscore / 8.0) * 100 + "%");
$("#iscore").html(parseInt((iscore / 8.0) * 100) + "%");
$("#istars").html(createStars(iscore/8.0 * 5));

var rscore = parseInt($("#q11").val()) + parseInt($("#q12").val()) + parseInt($("#q13").val());
$("#rbar").attr('style', "width: " +  (rscore / 7.0) * 100 + "%");
$("#rscore").html(parseInt((rscore / 7.0) * 100) + "%");
$("#rstars").html(createStars(rscore/7.0 * 5));

var tscore = fscore / 17 + ascore / 10.0 + iscore / 8.0 + rscore / 7.0;
$("#tbar").attr('style', "width: " +  tscore * 25.0 + "%");
$("#tscore").html(tscore);


$("#tpercentage").html(parseInt(tscore * 25.0) + "%");
console.log(tscore)
$("#tstars").html(createStars(tscore/4.0 * 5));

$("#q1_answer").html('<i>' + $("#q1 option:selected").text() + '</i>');
$("#q1_score").html($("#q1").val());

$("#q2_answer").html('<i>' + $("#q2 option:selected").text() + '</i>');
$("#q2_score").html($("#q2").val());

$("#q3_answer").html('<i>' + $("#q3 option:selected").text() + '</i>');
$("#q3_score").html($("#q3").val());

$("#q4_answer").html('<i>' + $("#q4 option:selected").text() + '</i>');
$("#q4_score").html($("#q4").val());

$("#f_total").html(fscore);

$("#q5_answer").html('<i>' + $("#q5 option:selected").text() + '</i>');
$("#q5_score").html($("#q5").val());

$("#q6_answer").html('<i>' + $("#q6 option:selected").text() + '</i>');
$("#q6_score").html($("#q6").val());

$("#q7_answer").html('<i>' + $("#q7 option:selected").text() + '</i>');
$("#7_score").html($("#q7").val());

$("#q14_answer").html('<i>' + $("#q14 option:selected").text() + '</i>');
$("#14_score").html($("#q14").val());

$("#a_total").html(ascore);

$("#q8_answer").html('<i>' + $("#q8 option:selected").text() + '</i>');
$("#q8_score").html($("#q8").val());
$("#q9_answer").html('<i>' + $("#q9 option:selected").text() + '</i>');
$("#q9_score").html($("#q9").val());
$("#q10_answer").html('<i>' + $("#q10 option:selected").text() + '</i>');
$("#q10_score").html($("#q10").val());
$("#i_total").html(iscore);

$("#q11_answer").html('<i>' + $("#q11 option:selected").text() + '</i>');
$("#q11_score").html($("#q11").val());
$("#q12_answer").html('<i>' + $("#q12 option:selected").text() + '</i>');
$("#q12_score").html($("#q12").val());
$("#q13_answer").html('<i>' + $("#q13 option:selected").text() + '</i>');
$("#q13_score").html($("#q13").val());
$("#r_total").html(rscore);


}

function createStars(score) {
var blank = '<span class="glyphicon glyphicon-star-empty" aria-hidden="true"></span>';
var filled = '<span class="glyphicon glyphicon-star" aria-hidden="true"></span>';
var html = "";
var i = 0;
score = Math.floor(score);

while (i < 5) {
if (score > i) {
html += filled;
} else {
html += blank;
}
i += 1;
}
return html;
}

</script>

```{r, echo=FALSE}


if (file.exists("./FAIRevaluation.csv")) {

library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)


findable=c(as.integer(my_csv2[2])/17*100+ as.integer(my_csv2[3])/17*100+as.integer(my_csv2[4])/17*100+as.integer(my_csv2[5])/17*100,(17-as.integer(my_csv2[2])-as.integer(my_csv2[3])-as.integer(my_csv2[4])-as.integer(my_csv2[5]))/17*100)


df <- data.frame(
Findable = c("Findable", "Not findable"), value = findable)


bp<- ggplot(df, aes(x="", y=value, fill=Findable))+
geom_bar(width = 1, stat = "identity")+
  coord_fixed() +
xlab("") + 
ylab("")

pie <- bp + coord_polar("y", start=0,direction=-1) + ggtitle("Findable") + scale_fill_manual(values = c('blue','gray'))
plot(pie)

head(df)

}

```









```{r, echo=FALSE}


if (file.exists("./FAIRevaluation.csv")) {
  
findable=c(as.integer(my_csv2[2])/17*100, as.integer(my_csv2[3])/17*100,as.integer(my_csv2[4])/17*100,as.integer(my_csv2[5])/17*100,(17-as.integer(my_csv2[2])-as.integer(my_csv2[3])-as.integer(my_csv2[4])-as.integer(my_csv2[5]))/17*100)


df <- data.frame(
Findable = c("Do you have a unique identifier for your datasets?", "Do you have a unique identifier for the metadata?", "Do you produce or collect metadata for all your data?", "Do you have a public metadata catalogue service?",""), value = findable)


bp<- ggplot(df, aes(x="", y=value, fill=Findable))+
geom_bar(width = 1, stat = "identity")+
xlab("") + 
ylab("")

pie <- bp + coord_polar("y", start=0) + ggtitle("Findable")
plot(pie)

head(df)

}

```













<script>




//Clear form once submitted
function clearForm(){
document.getElementById("form").reset();
}



function submitForm() {

document.getElementById('findablescore').value= document.getElementById("fscore").textContent;
document.getElementById('accessiblescore').value= document.getElementById("ascore").textContent;
document.getElementById('interopscore').value= document.getElementById("iscore").textContent;
document.getElementById('reusescore').value= document.getElementById("rscore").textContent;
document.getElementById('totalscore').value= document.getElementById("tpercentage").textContent;

document.getElementById('findable1').value= q1[q1.selectedIndex].id;
document.getElementById('findable2').value= q2[q2.selectedIndex].id;
document.getElementById('findable3').value= q3[q3.selectedIndex].id;
document.getElementById('findable4').value= q4[q4.selectedIndex].id;



var formData = $("form").serializeArray();
let csv = "data:text/csv;charset=utf-8,"; // accept data as CSV

formData.forEach(function(item) {
csv += item.value + ";"; // concat form value on csv var and add ; to create columns (you can change to , if want)
});

var encodedUri = encodeURI(csv);

// if you want to download
var downloadLink = document.createElement("a");
downloadLink.setAttribute("download", "FAIRevaluation.csv");
downloadLink.setAttribute("href", encodedUri);
document.body.appendChild(downloadLink); // Required for FF
downloadLink.click();
downloadLink.remove();

clearForm();
}
</script>
